alert.note: Alert for Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 03 at 12:43PM CDT until June 04 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Texas, including the following county, Lamar. * WHEN...Until 345 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will likely cause urban and small stream flooding. Low lying and/or poor drainage areas will experience minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Paris, Reno, Blossom, Pattonville, Deport, Sun Valley, Clardy, Milton, Minter, Taylor Town, Cunningham and Faught.
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
